        @RequestMapping(value="/customer/create",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public JSONResponse createCustomer(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                         String customer,
                                                                                                                         @RequestBody

                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                         String fi,
                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Method to create a new customer given its relationship with account and financial institutions
        Parameters:
        customer - given as a String to represent details of customer
        account - given as a String to represent account details for new customer
        fi - given as a String to represent financial institution for new customer
        response - given to set response type relative to the request
        request - given to set request type
        Returns:
        JSON message to indicate status of the action
